marketing.workInProgress: This page is still a work in progress - Follow along on GitHub
marketing.notLaunchedYet: Please note that Embloy is not active yet and you won't be able to sign up. Get in touch to access our Beta Version.
marketing.recruitmentSteps: All Recruitment Steps in One Place: Make life easier for both organizations and job seekers by centralizing recruitment processes.
marketing.featureDescription: Embloy serves as the bridge connecting organizations with prospective job seekers. Functioning as a middleware solution customized for the digital age, explore how Embloy can enhance your hiring process:
marketing.smartHiringDescription: Let jobseekers apply to any job with one Embloy account.
marketing.endToEndRecruitmentDescription: QR code applications for jobseekers to apply with one tap on their phone.
marketing.easyToIntegrateDescription: Ready to use in less than 10 lines of code.
marketing.oneClickToApplyDescription: Enjoy the convenience of a single platform, where everything is just a click away.
marketing.xPlatformDescription: Highly modular system, accessible on web, iOS, and Android, allows for custom integrations through API
marketing.socialToolsDescription: From CV parsing to automatic applications based on the applicants' skills, interests and expectations.
marketing.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
marketing.openSourceDescription: Embloy is open source and powered by open source software.
marketing.copyright: Copyright © 2024 Embloy, GbR. The source code is available on

pricing.basicSubscriptionForProviders: Job providers can request a basic subscription for an application if they want to verify that a user is "real" in which case the applicant will have to subscribe to Embloy-Free.

embloyFree.title: What's included in EMBLOY FREE
features: Apply to as many jobs as you want

pricing.priceCustom: Please note that the cost of Embloy integrations is determined on a case-by-case basis. If you're interested in partnering with us, please schedule a meeting.

oauth.success: Authentication successful. Please close this window.
oauth.error: Authentication failed. Please close this window and try again.
oauth.errorOccured: An error occurred: {error}. Please close this window and try again.

register.title: Welcome to Embloy!

upcoming.title: Upcoming Jobs
upcoming.subtitle: See what's next.
upcoming.startApply: You don't have jobs yet. Start applying now.
upcoming.applyWith: Apply to a job using either a given Quicklink request token or Genius Query.

applications.title: Applications
applications.subtitle: Your submitted applications.
applications.startApply: You don't have applications yet. Start applying now.

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription plan.
billing.noActiveSubscriptionsText: You don't have an active subscriptions yet. Start using Embloy's most exclusive features now.

basic.name: EMBLOY FREE
basic.description: One-Click-Application, apply to as many jobs as you want and no ads

premium.name: EMBLOY SMART
premium.description: Up to 50 active job postings and client token customization.

enterprise_1.name: EMBLOY GENIUS
enterprise_1.description: Unlimited job postings and much more.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage account and website settings.
settings.enterFullName: Please enter your full name and select an image to use as your profile picture.
settings.removeImageNotice: This is your current image. It will be replaced if you press upload.
settings.enterEmailPhone: Please enter your email and phone number.
settings.enterSocialMedia: Please enter your social media handles.
settings.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.selectTheme: Select the theme for the dashboard.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.applicationNotificationsDescription: Receive emails for status updates on submitted applications.
notifications.communicationEmailsDescription: Receive emails about your account activity.
notifications.marketingEmailsDescription: Stay updated with our new products, features, and more.
notifications.securityEmailsDescription: Receive alerts about suspicious account activity such as password changes, login from new devices, and more.

validations.image_url: Image URL must be a valid URL
validations.longitude: Longitude must be a valid number

validations.jobs_count: Jobs count must be a valid number

validations.application_notifications: Application notifications must be a boolean

validations.address: Address must be less than 150 characters

sdk.validURL: This field must be a valid URL

sdk.fieldsMarkedAreRequired: Fields marked with an * are required.

request.title: Something went wrong.
request.description: Your request was not processed. Please try again.

submit.title: Something went wrong.
submit.description: Your application was not submitted. Please try again.

invalidFileType.title: Something went wrong.
invalidFileType.description: Please upload a file in one of the allowed formats: {formats}.

invalidFileSize.title: Something went wrong.
invalidFileSize.description: The file size must be less than 2MB. Please try again.

notifications.ApplicationStatusNotification: You have a status update on your application.
notifications.ApplicationNotification: You have a new application notification.

400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The server was unable to process your request. Please try again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: You are not signed in, your credentials are invalid or your session has expired. Please sign in and try again.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You do not have permission to view this page. Possible reasons include: you don't have an active subscription, you have been blocked, or you do not have the necessary permissions. Please sign in and try again.

404.title: Uh oh! Not Found
404.description: This page or resource could not be found. Please try again.

409.title: Conflict
409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

410.title: Gone
410.description: The requested resource is no longer available and will not be available again.

422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.description: The server was unable to process your request. Please try again.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.description: You have sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Please try again later.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: An error occurred on the server. Please try again.

501.title: Not Implemented
501.description: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.description: This page is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

noInternet.title: No Internet Connection
noInternet.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

generic.title: Something went wrong.
generic.description: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support.
